alert.note: Alert for Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 10:37AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Little Minnesota River near Peever affecting Roberts County. Minnesota River at Ortonville affecting Big Stone County. North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1060.0 feet, Water reaches the bottom of the bridges on 145th Street and 480th Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 1060.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 AM CDT Thursday was 1062.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1056.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Friday evening by 745 PM CDT.
